tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE group_fitness_classes (
    class_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    instructor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    class_date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    capacity INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT,
    class_id INT,
    reminder_message TEXT,
    reminder_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE group_classes (
    class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name VARCHAR(50),
    class_instructor VARCHAR(50),
    class_date DATE,
    class_time TIME,
    class_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
    reminder_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    class_id UUID,
    member_id UUID,
    reminder_date TIMESTAMP,
    reminder_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE classes (
    class_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name VARCHAR(255),
    class_instructor VARCHAR(255),
    class_date DATE,
    class_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE GroupFitnessClasses (
    class_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    class_date DATE NOT NULL,
    class_time TIME NOT NULL,
    instructor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Reminders (
    reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT NOT NULL,
    class_id INT NOT NULL,
    reminder_date DATE NOT NULL,
    sent_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES Members(member_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (class_id) REFERENCES GroupFitnessClasses(class_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Updates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    class_id INT NOT NULL,
    update_message TEXT NOT NULL,
    update_date DATE NOT NULL,
    update_time TIME NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (class_id) REFERENCES GroupFitnessClasses(class_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reminders (
  reminder_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  class_id INT NOT NULL,
  member_id INT NOT NULL,
  reminder_date DATE NOT NULL,
  reminder_time TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE classes (
  class_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  class_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  class_description TEXT,
  class_date DATE NOT NULL,
  class_time TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE subscriptions (
  subscription_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  member_id INT NOT NULL,
  class_id INT NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
  notification_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  member_id INT NOT NULL,
  notification_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  notification_date DATE NOT NULL,
  notification_time TIME NOT NULL
);
